title: 292 - Pinky's Promise
description:
If you are going to be successful you have to wake up daily with a determination to create and execute. In this episode, Eric talks in detail about his experience with Pinky Cole and her team. Pinky is the founder of Slutty Vegan a vegan restaurant in Atlanta, GA.
 Listener Perks
  
RESPECT, the remarkable true story of Aretha Franklin, starring Jennifer Hudson, chronicles the rise of Aretha’s musical career from a child singing in her father’s church to her international and iconic fame. Her music has shaped a generation with songs like Think, Respect, and Amazing Grace. This movie boasts an all-star cast including Forrest Whitaker, Mary J. Blige, and Marlon Winans, among others. See RESPECT only in theatres August 13!
 
Hello Fresh: Get fresh pre-measured ingredients delivered to your door with Hello Fresh. Go to www.Hellofresh.com/success14 and use the Promo Code “SUCCESS14” to get 14 FREE Meals and FREE shipping.

 
Organifi is giving our listeners up to 20% off of their order! Just go to www.organifi.com/success. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime, anywhere while on the go.

If you are going to be successful you have to wake up daily with a determination to create and execute. In this episode, Eric talks in detail about his experience with Pinky Cole and her team. Pinky is the founder of Slutty Vegan a vegan restaurant in Atlanta, GA.

Listener Perks

  • RESPECT, the remarkable true story of Aretha Franklin, starring Jennifer Hudson, chronicles the rise of Aretha’s musical career from a child singing in her father’s church to her international and iconic fame. Her music has shaped a generation with songs like Think, Respect, and Amazing Grace. This movie boasts an all-star cast including Forrest Whitaker, Mary J. Blige, and Marlon Winans, among others. See RESPECT only in theatres August 13!
